alert.note: Alert for Barry (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 03 at 5:13PM EDT by NWS Grand Rapids
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1115 PM EDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Portions of south central Michigan and southwest Michigan, including the following counties, in south central Michigan, Clinton, Eaton and Ingham. In southwest Michigan, Barry. * WHEN...Until 1115 PM EDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Water over roadways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 513 PM EDT, Radar and automated rain gauges indicated heavy rain. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Lansing, Charlotte, East Lansing, Grand Ledge, Potterville, Edgemont Park, DeWitt, Assyria, Kalamo, Dimondale, Vermontville, Waverly, Gresham, Bath, Haslett and Lacey. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
